name: studip-lucky-consultation
description: Stud.IP plugin for lot based consultation hours
author: Till Gl√∂ggler <tgloeggl@uos.de>

scripts.translate: gettext-extract --attribute v-i18n --attribute v-translate --output locale/en/LC_MESSAGES/lucky-consultation.pot $(find vueapp -type f -name '*.vue') && /bin/bash translate.sh && gettext-compile --output vueapp/i18n/translations.json locale/en/LC_MESSAGES/lucky-consultation.po
scripts.zip: zip -r LuckyConsultation-V$npm_package_version.zip app cronjobs migrations lib vendor static README.md LuckyConsultation.php plugin.manifest
scripts.tests: cp vendor/behat/gherkin/i18n.php vendor/i18n.php && php vendor/bin/codecept run --steps
